data.descriptionTextarea: Recruiters We stand by you every step of the way.

list.reviewTextarea: The PGDM program at ASBS went beyond my expectations. The industry-driven curriculum and hands-on projects gave me the skills to succeed in the corporate world.
The entrepreneurship workshops gave me the push I needed to start my own business. ASBS provided the right guidance and resources to turn my ideas into reality.
Industry exposure and collaborative projects helped me build strong professional connections, expanding my career prospects.
The PGDM program’s practical approach changed the way I think about business. It gave me the experience and knowledge to thrive in my field.
ASBS’s product management training helped me bridge my skill gaps and made me fully prepared for the industry.

Joining ASBS was the best decision for my career. The institute gave me strong domain knowledge, practical exposure, and continuous mentorship. That preparation helped me confidently step into a global role.

data.subtitleTextarea: Join ASBS MBA today and make an impact that matters!
data.descriptionTextarea: Experience world-class education, global exposure, and top-tier placements—all in the serene yet dynamic setting of ASBS MBA. Your journey to success starts here.
data.addressTextarea: Bharatiya Vidya Bhavan, Plot 3A, Sector-30, Vashi, Navi Mumbai – 400703

questions.questionsInput: 1. What is ASBS MBA?
questions.answerTextarea:
ASBS MBA (Akademia School of Business Studies) is India’s leading 1-Chain B-School platform, powering AICTE-approved PGDM and UGC-approved MMS programs across partner institutions—empowering the 99% to outperform the top 1%.
Ranked India’s No. 1 for Core Finance placements for freshers, with equally strong results in Marketing and HR, ASBS MBA offers one of the strongest >100% ROI propositions in management education: ₹6–8 lakh average fees, ₹8 LPA+ average placements, a ₹12 LPA highest CTC, and a ~15-month payback period. Many graduates accelerate to a ₹30 LPA career trajectory within 3 years through specialised, outcome-driven MBA pathways.
ASBS MBA is trusted by industry, with a robust 250+ recruiter network, including recruiters such as Morgan Stanley, Anarock, Opus Fund Services, HC Global, ISS Stoxx, Kotak, HDFC Life, Citco, and Today Group, to name a few.
With 80% industry-expert faculty, a strong 10,000+ alumni network, 15+ years of academic excellence, and 12+ campuses across Mumbai, Goa, Bangalore, and Pune, ASBS ensures consistency, credibility, and economies of scale. As India’s only CEEMAN institutional member, ASBS connects its students to 200+ global B-schools, bringing global thinking to Indian careers.
ASBS MBA is where students build careers, parents see assured value, and corporates hire job-ready leaders.

questions.questionsInput: 2. Which programs are offered under ASBS MBA?
questions.answerTextarea:
ASBS MBA offers the following full-time and work-integrated programs:
FFOI Powered PGDM in Global Core Finance (Core Finance focus)
ASBS Multi-City Global MBA (PGDM with India + Europe exposure)
ASBS MBA – PGDM (General Management with specialisations)
ASBS MMS+ (UGC-approved MMS with enhanced industry exposure)
ASBS MMS (University-affiliated MMS)
ASBS Job+ MBA (Work-integrated earn-while-you-learn format)
All programs are designed with placement and ROI as the primary outcome.

questions.questionsInput: 3. Are ASBS MBA programs AICTE or UGC approved?
questions.answerTextarea:
Yes.
PGDM programs are AICTE-approved
MMS programs are UGC-approved and university-affiliated
ASBS operates strictly within regulatory norms and partner institutions are duly approved.

questions.questionsInput: 4. Why Choose ASBS MBA?
questions.answerTextarea:
India’s No. 1 for Core Finance Placements for Freshers
With equally strong outcomes in Marketing & HR, ASBS MBA is built for real careers—not just degrees.
Exceptional ROI & Career Growth
₹6–8 lakh fees, ₹8 LPA+ average placements, ₹12 LPA highest CTC, ~15-month ROI, and a proven ₹30 LPA career trajectory within 3 years.
Placement-First, Industry-Driven Learning
Backed by 250+ recruiters and 80% industry-expert mentors, ensuring students are job-ready from Day One.
Global Exposure with Indian Advantage
India’s only CEEMAN institutional member, connected to 200+ global B-schools and European immersion opportunities.
Scale, Trust & Legacy
15+ years of excellence, 10,000+ alumni, and 12+ campuses across Mumbai, Goa, Bangalore, and Pune—delivering consistency, credibility, and outcomes.
Built for the 99% to Win
A proven platform designed to empower the 99% to outperform the top 1%—for students, parents, and recruiters alike.

questions.questionsInput: 5. What is European-approach rolling admissions at ASBS MBA?
questions.answerTextarea:
ASBS MBA follows a rolling admissions approach, inspired by European B-Schools and aligned with its membership in CEEMAN.
This means:
Applications are evaluated continuously
Seats are offered cycle-by-cycle
Programs close once capacity is filled
Early applicants get priority for interviews, scholarships, campuses, and specialisations.

questions.questionsInput: 6. Which entrance exams are accepted for ASBS MBA admissions?
questions.answerTextarea:
ASBS MBA accepts scores from the following national and state-level exams:
CAT
XAT
SNAP
NMAT
MAH MBA CET
MAT
CMAT
Final selection is based on entrance score + interview performance + profile evaluation.

questions.questionsInput: 7. What is the eligibility criteria for ASBS MBA?
questions.answerTextarea:
To apply, candidates must:
Hold a Bachelor’s degree from a recognized university
Have minimum 50% aggregate marks (45% for reserved categories)
Final-year students are eligible to apply
Work experience is not mandatory for most programs.

questions.questionsInput: 8. What is ASSET – ASBS Scholarship Entrance Test?
questions.answerTextarea:
ASSET (Akademia Schools Skills Evaluation Test) is a merit-based internal test conducted by ASBS for candidates who are not CAT 95+ percentilers but seek scholarship consideration.
Performance in ASSET determines partial to full tuition fee scholarships, subject to availability.

questions.questionsInput: 9. Who is eligible for the 100% Tuition Fee Scholarship?
questions.answerTextarea:
Candidates with CAT 95+ percentile are eligible for 100% tuition fee scholarship
Other CAT candidates may qualify via ASSET (Akademia Schools Skills Evaluation Test)
Scholarships are merit-based, limited, and offered during early admission cycles.

questions.questionsInput: 10. What specialisations are offered at ASBS MBA?
questions.answerTextarea:
ASBS MBA offers recruiter-driven, role-aligned specialisations, including:
FFOI Powered - Global Core Finance
Investment Banking & Hedge Fund Operations
BFSI Management
Corporate Finance
Business Analytics & AI
Real Estate & PropTech
MarTech, Digital Marketing & AI
Strategic Brand & Product Management
HR Leadership & People Analytics
Specialisations are aligned with live hiring roles and industry demand.

questions.questionsInput: 11. How strong are placements at ASBS MBA?
questions.answerTextarea:
ASBS MBA has a placement-first model with:
₹8 LPA average salary
₹12 LPA highest salary
₹30 LPA projected career trajectory within 3 years*
~15 months average ROI horizon
250+ recruiters across BFSI, Investment Banking, Hedge Fund Operations, Consulting, Tech, FMCG, Healthcare, Real Estate & Analytics
*Projections based on alumni and market data; outcomes depend on individual performance.

questions.questionsInput: 12. Which companies recruit from ASBS MBA?
questions.answerTextarea:
ASBS alumni and students work with leading global and Indian organisations, including investment banks, hedge funds, consulting firms, BFSI institutions, corporates, startups, and MNCs across multiple sectors.
Recruitment is supported through live projects, mock interviews, and mentor-led preparation.

questions.questionsInput: 13. What is the mentor model at ASBS MBA?
questions.answerTextarea:
ASBS follows a blended mentorship model:
80% Industry Mentors – active professionals leading real businesses
20% Academic Faculty – strong conceptual grounding
This ensures students are industry-ready from Day One.

questions.questionsInput: 14. Does ASBS MBA offer international exposure?
questions.answerTextarea: Yes. Select programs offer European immersion and global exposure through academic and industry linkages, including collaboration with IEDC-Bled School of Management.

questions.questionsInput: 15. Where are ASBS MBA campuses and partner institutions located?
questions.answerTextarea:
ASBS MBA operates through multiple partner institutions across:
Mumbai (Jogeshwari, Kurla)
Navi Mumbai  (Vashi, Nerul, Kharghar, Karjat)
Pune
Bangalore
Goa
Dharashiv (Osmanabad)
This allows students to choose campuses based on location, program, and career goals.

questions.questionsInput: 16. Is ASBS MBA suitable for freshers?
questions.answerTextarea:
Yes. ASBS MBA is especially known for core finance placements for freshers, supported by structured training, internships, and placement preparation.
Final-year students and fresh graduates form a significant portion of each cohort.

questions.questionsInput: 17. Can working professionals apply to ASBS MBA?
questions.answerTextarea:
Absolutely. ASBS MBA is suitable for:
Working professionals seeking career acceleration
Career switchers moving into finance, analytics, marketing, or leadership roles
Entrepreneurs building scalable ventures
The Job+ MBA is specifically designed for working learners.

questions.questionsInput: 18. How can I apply for ASBS MBA admissions 2026–28?
questions.answerTextarea:
You can apply online by:
Filling the online application form
Submitting entrance exam details
Appearing for a personal interview / ASSET (Akademia Schools Skills Evaluation Test)
Completing selection and enrollment formalities
Early applications are strongly recommended due to rolling admissions.

questions.questionsInput: 19. Is free career counselling available before applying?
questions.answerTextarea:
Yes. ASBS MBA offers free 1-on-1 career counselling to help students:
Choose the right program
Select suitable specialisations
Understand ROI and placement paths

questions.questionsInput: 20. What is the duration of the ASBS MBA programs?
questions.answerTextarea:
Most ASBS MBA programs are 2-year full-time programs.
The Job+ MBA follows a work-integrated structure while maintaining academic rigor and placement support.

questions.questionsInput: 21. How can I contact ASBS MBA for admissions support?
questions.answerTextarea:
+91 8065138222
Bharatiya Vidya Bhavan, Plot 3A, Sector-30, Vashi, Navi Mumbai – 400703
You can also use the Apply Now or Get In Touch options on the website.
